title: Generate a Quality Measure Report
description: A practice manager needs to generate a report on their performance for the 'Controlling High Blood Pressure' quality measure for a specific payer program.

tasks.description: Navigate to the quality reporting section of the analytics tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager finds the quality measure dashboard.

tasks.description: Select the 'Controlling High Blood Pressure (HBP)' measure and the desired payer program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager configures the report for the correct measure and population.

tasks.description: Run the report, which shows the numerator, denominator, and performance rate for the measure.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is generated, showing the practice's performance and a list of patients who are not meeting the measure's goal.
